DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether transdermal nicotine reduces pain among woman chronic pelvic pain .
DOC.detailed_description: Potential subject female non-smokers present physician treatment chronic pelvic pain . When consent , subject fill questionnaire demographic information pain experience . The trial conduct home three day . Each subject use three different level nicotine ( 0mg , 5mg , 10mg ) administer random order ; study double-blinded patient act control . Subjects apply placebo nicotine patch morning remove evening fill pain diary day . During study , patient continue typical course pain medication report pain medication use pain diary .
DOC.criteria: Chronic pelvic pain Aged 1860 year Female Uncontrolled hypertension Cardiovascular disease Current analgesic abuse Pregnancy Current usage nicotine patch gum Allergy adhesive tape
